FuncDef:
The car command configures the traffic monitoring for DAA.
The undo car command cancels the configuration.
By default, the traffic monitoring for DAA is not configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When run the traffic-statisticcommand to collect the traffic statistics about DAA services in traffic behavior. The carcommand need to be configured to enable the traffic monitoring function for DAA.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The command is exclusive with the car command used in configuring cir parameters.
The car command is mutually exclusive with the traffic-policy outbound vxlan-mode command in the bridge domain view .
